title: Silver Support main looking for ADC to duo with.
body:
Heyo, Secretmana here, I'm looking for an ADC main ( preferably in silver ) that wants to duo. 
I main support but i can play anywhere but top. 
Champs ( supports ) i can play incredibly well are {{champion:412}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:89}} 
Thresh and sona are usually my go to champs. 
I'm looking for someone who knows when to go in and knows what they should be doing and when it should be done. 
If you're interested add me on league  ( Secretmana )or reply below.
Cheers.

replies.body:
Hey man 
My mains are Tristana, Corki and jinx
I have looking for a good support to duo with and i am in b2 but i play for a platnum team and they seem to think that i deserve atleast silver. i have a huge knowledge of the game and they role and i win most games. i go adc every game.
Username: SAP Herbie
you look alright, ill have a few games with ya

Hey I've been looking for a support main for ages, My mains are Tristana, Lucian and Varus and occasionally throw in some Vayne.
I have extended knowledge about the role and would be honored to duo with you.

IGN: R3d Bladez

Hey bro, i'm not the Godlike ADC you might be wanting to find, but i feel like i have a decent knowledge of the role and would like to duo ( i need someone to help me out of bronze ) but plz dont let that deter you, i am not your every day bronze player, i just cant reach my potential, any comment would be awesome, Add Me Mullyplant94
Im not an adc main but i would love to play with u everytime i play adc i dont get a support so i want to add u plz
